name: Water and Waste Disposal Systems for Rural Communities
objective: Provide loan and grant funds for water and waste projects serving the most financially needy communities. Financial assistance should result in reasonable user costs for rural residents, rural businesses, and other rural users.
assistance_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: 200 grants were awarded and 281 loans were issued under this program in FY24.

rules_regulations: 7 CFR 1780, Water and Waste Loans and Grants, 7 CFR 1779, Water and Waste Disposal Program Guaranteed Loans.
